thread.title: Recent Killings Taking Toll on Bangladesh Garment Industry
thread.title_full: Recent Killings Taking Toll on Bangladesh Garment Industry - WSJ

author: Syed Zain Al-Mahmood
title: Recent Killings Taking Toll on Bangladesh Garment Industry
text:
DHAKA, Bangladesh—International retailers are postponing business trips to Bangladesh or requesting armed escorts to accompany them on visits, factory owners and buying agents said, as the government works to contain the economic fallout from the recent killings of two foreign nationals claimed by Islamic State.
The U.S. on Saturday warned of a “continued threat against foreigners” in the country after an Italian and a Japanese... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
